about_the_game:
You can try the beginning of Ruya: Ascension for free! This demo features a small slice of the full game.

About

Ruya: Ascension is a meditative puzzle game and sequel to the original award-winning game.

Caught in a time loop, Ruya visits different universes freeing lost souls by giving parts of herself away in order to attempt to unlock her past memories.

Ruya: Ascension presents a brand-new adventure set in a surreal plane of existence, featuring numerous new puzzles that build upon the experience of the original hit game.

Demo Features

  • Play through and experience chapters 1 & 2!

  • Solve around 24 of grid based logic puzzles inspired by classic puzzle games like Bust-a-move and Hexic!

  • Feel out our brand new puzzle pieces expanding on the original game.

  • An undo feature to help resolve past mistakes and work through solutions.

  • Enrico Ercole is back! With his original music, mix of live instruments and handcrafted audio.

short_description: Ruya awakens from the sound of a clap floating in infinite space. As you solve puzzles and free lost souls you come to learn why she finds herself unable to ascend.
